extendedInfo.description: If youâre looking for the finest card games available for mobile, AcesÂ® has got them in Spades! The team that brought you AcesÂ® Hearts, Aces Cribbage, and Aces Solitaire is back with a new offering in the Aces line of quality card games.Aces Spades brings the classic card game to mobile with gorgeous graphics, online multiplayer, and fully customizable gameplay. Youâll team up with one of 11 beautifully rendered Victorian-era characters to test your skill against a variety of colorful opponents, each with their own unique styles of play.Take tricks, bid nil, and pass to your partner in the most complete Spades experience available for mobile: Aces Spades!Game Features:â¢	Online Multiplayerâ¢	Play Standard, Mirror, Whiz, or Suicideâ¢	11 distinct animated opponentsâ¢	5 difficulty levels and intuitive AIâ¢	Customizable bidding optionsâ¢	Gameplay suited for all skill levelsâ¢	Leaderboards and achievementsâ¦â¦â¦ Permissions requested and how they are used â¦â¦â¦â¢  android.permission.INTERNET: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.â¢  android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.â¢  android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.â¢  android.permission.VIBRATE: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device.

reviews.title: Really enjoy this app!
reviews.comment: Very fast, gives u hints on bids since when first starting to play u never know how opponites will play. Very satisfied with this app. Hope ya\'ll will enjoy as much as I do. Ply a few rounds & I believe you\'ll see exactly what I mean. Live 2 Play.       Sassy
reviews.author: Gregorg Brugh

reviews.title: Game play
reviews.comment: SG2- Nice graphics, game play is visually stunning. The 90sec adds are a killer though. Get full version and it is a winner!
reviews.author: Lauro Rolon

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: This game is just great. Very polished. Works perfectly. And looks awesome on a tablet.
reviews.author: Ryan Pierce

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I play all the time loads of fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 4 STARS ON SG2 !!!!
reviews.comment: Loving this app addictive on every level works good on my SG2 wld give it 5 STARS but not until they fix da spyware issue & get a go bak button 2 rebid when u wanna change ur bid ...
reviews.author: leticia Anderson

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Such a fun game! Just hate the long ads that I can\'t skip.
reviews.author: Chauryce Brooks-Rector

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I just wished you can have some kind of communication with your partner online and not many people multiplayer. What\'s up with that?
reviews.author: Michael Castillo

reviews.title: This ...
reviews.comment: This company is pretty solid! I have downloaded gin rummy and this one with NO COMPLAINTS!  Thanks guys (and gals).
reviews.author: Jessica Tunnis

reviews.title: Really good spades.
reviews.comment: I think it\'s the best spades game. Unfortunatelly, still little people play this game, so in multiplayer mode i must play with one person and two AI :(
reviews.author: Krzysiek K.

reviews.title: Surprise
reviews.comment: I was trying to earn coins on another app and downloaded this. I totally expected to open it up and immediately uninstall it but it looked good so I checked it out and now I am in LOVE!!!!! Awesome game, tons of fun, no bugs
reviews.author: Breannda Malnar

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: After update it crashes every time I open the game. This was hands down my favorite game. Please fix. I will change the review
reviews.author: Demitri Haynes

reviews.comment: Grea I love it. The skill level is just like you are playing against real people
reviews.author: Danette Brown

reviews.title: Nil killa
reviews.comment: App keeps crashing!!! Moved on to another spades app... get it right or get left!!! Truth be told!!! Harsh I know!!! I loved it until this... o well... u tried!!!
reviews.author: antoine angli

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Fun game! Good way to brush up on your Spades skills.
reviews.author: Justin Crowder

reviews.title: A Real Partner
reviews.comment: Is game would b great if your partner played with u instead of against you.  Otherwise a great game.
reviews.author: Michelle Butts

reviews.comment: Like the game, but I had delete and reinstall because of it freezing my screen.
reviews.author: Jeff Byrd

reviews.title: new update not so good
reviews.comment: The new update does not allow you to check the score in the middle of a game.  Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I spent hours having a lot of fun.  This is a wonderful way to spend that time.  The graphics are great the game options are great!
reviews.author: Joan Johnson

reviews.comment: The only thing I don\'t like is that I can\'t play my spades in the hand when I want that really frustrating
reviews.author: Frederica Barnes

reviews.title: Simply Super...
reviews.comment: This is really great app. I want more from this developers...
reviews.author: sangili rajan
